author: Rachel Torgerson
title: Paris Jackson Wears Rainbow Jumpsuit to the Grammys 2017 - Paris Jackson Sexy Grammys Outfit
text:
Paris Jackson Stuns in Rainbow Jumpsuit With Crazy Slits at the Grammys 
Seriously, you have to see these slits. By Rachel Torgerson Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Paris Jackson, daughter of Michael Jackson, is attending the Grammys as a presenter, and she made a statement in a sparkly, rainbow-themed Balmain jumpsuit. The plunging outfit featured cutouts on the sides and ~sexy~ slits up the front and back of each pant leg. Paris paired it with coordinating Balmain heels, Kimberly McDonalds jewelry, and an oil-slick colored WAR by Michael Bradley clutch. Paris's typical street style involves distressed T-shirts and leather, so this sparkly jumpsuit is a bit of a departure, but girl looks good from all angles! Getty
